messages.subject: Geog. info...Trekker Bear
messages.msgSnippet: I thought that some of you might be interested in this. I was forwarded the info to pass on to my  Canadian hser group but thought that you might enjoy it too.
messages.messageBody:
I thought that some of you might be interested in this. I was forwarded the
info to pass on to my Canadian hser group but thought that you might
enjoy it too. Apologies if this is redundant info.
Brooke in B.C.



------- Forwarded message follows -------

I am the List owner of TrekkerBear@onelist.com . We are commited to an
ongoing geography project for homeschooling families. Rather than
subsribe to; post a message then unsubscribe to 50 lists, I have decided
to ask of you a favor.

We would like news of our project to reach homeschooling families all
over the world,and we need your help.

The Trekker Bear project monitors the progress of Trekker T.W.T. Bear.
Host families open their homes to Trekker for one week, post his
adventues to the Trekker Bear List and send him on to his next host
family.

The Trekker Bear Project is managed by Alexis Carrington (me) of the
Carrington Family, in New York State.

Information about The Trekker Bear Project, how to become a Travel
Journal Pal and how to become a host family can be found on
our Website at :

http://members.xoom.com/_XOOM/ceeshouse/trekker.htm


Thank you for taking the time to read this and pass the information on
to your list.

Alexis Carrington
CeesHouse@...



brynlee@...
